name: Belbergia Thagus
description:
--Fig12--
Belbergia Thagus is a creature from Thestias, an exoplanet located 33 light years from earth, orbiting the star Pollux.
Belbergia has two life cycles, one as a flower-like creature, attached to the ground, and another as a floating being, who lives in big yellow clouds of Selenium, eating shoals of small pink animals that give his pinky color. 
The species is very psychic and can easily control the winds and seas of its planet. It has a mental pulse that is used for a big range of things, from calling a mate to even scare a predator.
